attributes.action: intervene and ask the public to design and vote for a new logo for London 2012
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Apart from Seb Coe no one likes the logos, they have become a laughing stock.  Have a competition and make the next "evolution" of the logo be one that the public is not embarrassed to be associated with.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
